suncertify.core
Class ApplicationContext

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.core.ApplicationContext

public final class ApplicationContext
extends Object

ApplicationContext is a context class that contains configuration details for all system needed in different places along the whole system hierarchy. During initialization it reads configuration from the following files:

  • suncertify.properties
  • command.properties
All configuration details can be retrieved and/or changed via getXXX and setXXX methods (see methods doc for detailed description). This class enables also to store changed configuration (only suncertify.properties) to the file system (in order to persist configuration).

This class is Singleton and its instance can be obtained via getInstance() method.

Author:
Przemyslaw Bielicki

storeProperties

public void storeProperties()
                     throws FileNotFoundException,
                            IOException
Stores configuration properties into the configuration file - suncertify.properties.

Throws:
FileNotFoundException - If configuration file was not found in the classpath.
IOException - If IO exception occurs during creating FileOutputStream object - see FileOutputStream.FileOutputStream(java.lang.String).
